response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by our customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth, I propose selling it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the product's value but also the service and support we provide with every purchase. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 120}
